The user points their hand at a target, [[Wikipedia:Finger gun|mimicking a gun with their fingers]]. They then generate a ball of water at their fingertip, shooting it at the opponent. Cupping both hands together and making the gesture, it can generate a larger ball of  water than can be used to unleash the bullets in quick succession.
